### 그리드와 직선의 두께

```{r, engine = 'tikz'}
#| label: fig-pde_grid
#| code-fold: true
#| echo: fenced
#| output: asis
#| fig-width: 8
#| fig-align: center
#| fig-cap: "2차원 그리드"
\usetikzlibrary{arrows}
\usetikzlibrary{positioning}
\usetikzlibrary{calc}
\usetikzlibrary{arrows}

\begin{tikzpicture}


\draw[-{stealth}] (-1., 0) -- (8,0) node[right] {$x$};
\draw[-{stealth}] (0,-1) -- (0,6) node[above] {$y$};

\foreach \x in {2,3,4,5,7} {
  \draw[] (\x, 1) -- (\x, 5); 
  \draw[] (\x, 0.1) -- (\x, -0.1);
}
\foreach \y in {1,2,3,5} {
  \draw[] (2, \y) -- (7, \y);
  \draw[] (0.1, \y) -- (-0.1, \y);
}

\node[below, scale=0.8] at (2, -0.1) {$x_0=a$};
\node[below, scale=0.8] at (3, -0.1) {$x_1$};
\node[below, scale=0.8] at (4, -0.1) {$x_2$};
\node[below, scale=0.8] at (5, -0.1) {$x_3$};
\node[below, scale=0.8] at (7, -0.1) {$x_N=b$};

\node[left, scale=0.8] at (-0.1, 1) {$y_0=c$};
\node[left, scale=0.8] at (-0.1, 2) {$y_1$};
\node[left, scale=0.8] at (-0.1, 3) {$y_2$};
\node[left, scale=0.8] at (-0.1, 5) {$y_M=d$};

\node[] at (6, 1.5) {$\cdots$};
\node[] at (6, 2.5) {$\cdots$};
\node[] at (2.5, 4) {$\vdots$};
\node[] at (3.5, 4) {$\vdots$};
\node[] at (4.5, 4) {$\vdots$};
\node[] at (5.5, 4) {$\vdots$};
\node[] at (6.5, 4) {$\vdots$};
\end{tikzpicture}
```
